_description: Business-defined MVP requirements for zone launch readiness. These are TARGETS, not data-driven inflection points.
_note: Data-driven inflection points (where metrics improve) are in DATA/3_ANALYSIS/mvp_threshold_discovery.json
_see_also: config/dashboard_metrics.json for reconciled counts, threshold comparison, and MVP dashboard data flow
_dashboard_integration: These thresholds are displayed in the MVP Thresholds tab of DELIVERABLES/dashboards/dinneroo_master_dashboard.html
_source_of_truth: Anna's categorisations from Dish Analysis Dec-25 - Item Categorisation.csv
_canonical_definitions: scripts/utils/definitions.py - all agents must import from this module

mvp_status_tiers._description: Tiered MVP status based on Core 7 cuisine count. 5 is north star, 3 is data inflection point.

Supply Only.description: Has partners but no orders yet

cuisines_min.justification: Covers diverse family preferences across Anna's 7 cuisine categories
cuisines_min.data_inflection_note: Data shows improvement at 3+ cuisines, but 5 is business target

partners_min.data_inflection_note: Data shows +4.5pp repeat rate at 3+ partners, but 5 is business target

dishes_min.justification: Minimum 3 dishes per core cuisine Ã— 7 cuisines

repeat_rate_min.justification: Families find value and return - top zones: 40%+
repeat_rate_min.note: This is a percentage (35%), not decimal (0.35)

cuisines._note: Anna's 7 cuisine categories (SOURCE OF TRUTH for zone supply)

mapping_notes.Asian: Includes Japanese, Vietnamese, Thai, Chinese, Korean - maps to 'Japanese/Asian', 'Thai/Vietnamese' in older docs
mapping_notes.Healthy: Includes grain bowls, salads, protein & veg - maps to 'Chicken (Grilled)' for protein focus
mapping_notes.British: Includes shepherd's pie, roasts, fish & chips

dish_types._note: Anna's 24 dish types from Item Categorisation (SOURCE OF TRUTH)

core_drivers._description: 8 dish types that drive performance (high demand + high preference)

preference_drivers._description: 5 dish types with strong consumer preference

demand_boosters._description: 2 dish types with high demand but lower preference scores

deprioritised._description: Dish types to maintain but not expand

quality_checks._description: Dish type rankings should NOT mimic these sources

og_survey_suitability.note: OG Survey measures stated preference, not revealed preference
og_survey_suitability.issue: Rankings may reflect familiarity bias, not actual performance

live_dinneroo_availability.note: Current supply reflects what we have, not what works best
live_dinneroo_availability.issue: Rankings may reflect partner availability, not customer demand

quality_checks.validation: Quadrant classifications in dish_scoring_anna_aligned.csv combine actual sales + satisfaction + coverage-adjusted metrics

_deprecated._note: These fields are kept for backwards compatibility but should not be used
_deprecated.deprecation_reason: Replaced by Anna's categorisations above - use cuisines.categories and dish_types instead
